entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. POP 30%
